title: Robbie Coleman
text:
Robert "Robbie" Coleman (born 3 August 1990) is an <a href="Australian">Australian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for the <a href="NOLA%20Gold">NOLA Gold</a> in <a href="Major%20League%20Rugby">Major League Rugby</a> (MLR).
Coleman left the <a href="Brumbies%20koi%28rugby%29">Brumbies</a> after being granted a release at the end of the 2016 <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a> season. His playing position is either <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">fly-half, centre or full-back</a>. He made his <a href="Brumbies%20%28rugby%29">Brumbies</a> debut during the <a href="2010%20Super%2014%20season">2010 Super 14 season</a> against the <a href="Queensland%20Reds">Reds</a> in <a href="Canberra">Canberra</a>.
